alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Canyon (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 22 at 1:37PM MDT until October 24 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON SUNDAY TO NOON MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow and areas of blowing snow. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 5 inches with locally heavier accumulations in the higher foothills. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Bighorn Canyon. * WHEN...From Noon Sunday to Noon MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to heavy wet snow accumulations and very poor visibility. The combination of heavy wet snow, along with the strong winds, may result in tree and power line damage causing sporadic power outages. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute.
info.instruction: Consider delaying travel until conditions improve Monday afternoon. If you must travel, slow down and use caution. Make sure to have a winter survival kit in your vehicle in case you become stranded. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
